title: 전치사+관계대명사
description: 격식체 관계절에서 전치사가 앞에 오는 구조를 긴 문장에서 활용합니다. PREPOSITION-RELATIVE-FORMAL 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: The framework within which the system operates is outdated.
The terms of which were not disclosed in the agreement.
The person to whom I spoke was very helpful.
learning_points: 격식체 문서와 공식 발표에서의 전치사+관계대명사 활용

sentences.en: The framework within which the system operates is outdated.
There were terms the details of which were not disclosed in the contract.

sentences.kr: 제가 이야기한 사람은 매우 도움이 되었습니다.
sentences.en: The person to whom I spoke was very helpful.

sentences.kr: 우리가 의존하고 있는 시스템은 업그레이드가 필요합니다.
sentences.en: The system on which we depend requires upgrading.

sentences.kr: 회사가 기반을 둔 원칙들은 여전히 유효합니다.
sentences.en: The principles on which the company is founded remain valid.

sentences.kr: 우리가 협력하는 파트너들은 신뢰할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: The partners with whom we collaborate are reliable.

sentences.kr: 결정이 내려진 기준은 명확하게 문서화되어야 합니다.
sentences.en: The criteria according to which decisions are made should be clearly documented.

sentences.kr: 정책이 개발된 배경을 이해하는 것이 중요합니다.
sentences.en: It's important to understand the context within which the policy was developed.
